description: This file defines the core chess rules logic, including move generation, move validation, check detection, and attack analysis. It encapsulates various rules for different pieces, castling, en passant, and move filtering to generate legal moves.

methods.name: generateLegalMoves
methods.description: Generates all legal moves for a given position and side, filtering out moves that leave the king in check.

methods.name: generateLegalMovesFrom
methods.description: Filters the legal moves to those originating from a specific square.

methods.name: isKingInCheck
methods.description: Determines if the king of a given color is under attack in the current position.

methods.name: isSquareAttacked
methods.description: Checks if a specific square is attacked by any opponent's pieces.

methods.name: attacksSquare
methods.description: Analyzes if a specific piece attacks a target square based on piece type and position.

methods.name: generatePseudoLegalMoves
methods.description: Generates all possible moves for the side to move, ignoring king safety rules.
